trans-unit.source: Represents the data in a SOAP request received or a SOAP response sent by an XML Web service method at a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML Web Service 方法在特定 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage" /> 所接收的 SOAP 要求中或所傳送的 SOAP 回應中的資料。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment is part of a SOAP extension that logs the SOAP messages sent and received by an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼片段是記錄傳送和接收的 XML Web 服務方法的 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This specific fragment processes the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> passed into the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the SOAP extension by writing properties of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage> to the log file.
trans-unit.target: 處理這個特定片段<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>傳入<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.ProcessMessage%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>撰寫屬性的 SOAP 擴充功能的方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage>記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the SOAPAction HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: 取得 SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的 SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: The SOAPAction HTTP request header field for the SOAP request or SOAP response.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 要求或 SOAP 回應的 SOAPAction HTTP 要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Action%2A> property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Action%2A>屬性可以在任何存取<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment is part of a SOAP extension that logs the SOAP messages sent and received by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼片段是記錄傳送和接收的 XML Web 服務 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This particular fragment outputs to that log file the value of the `SOAPAction` HTTP request header field.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定片段輸出至該記錄檔的值`SOAPAction`HTTP 要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets a representation of the method prototype for the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: 取得 SOAP 要求所適用 XML Web Service 方法的方法原型 (Prototype) 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> representing the XML Web service method for which the SOAP request is intended.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" />，表示 SOAP 要求所適用的 XML Web Service 方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.MethodInfo%2A> property can be accessed during any stage, the method information is only available during <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.MethodInfo%2A>屬性可以存取任一階段，方法有可用的資訊只在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize>。

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment is part of a SOAP extension that logs the SOAP messages sent and received by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼片段是記錄傳送和接收的 XML Web 服務 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This particular fragment outputs to that log file the name of the XML Web service method requested.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定片段輸出至該記錄檔要求的 XML Web 服務方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the client waits for the server to finish processing an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出用戶端是否等候伺服器完成 XML Web Service 方法的處理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the client waits for the server to completely process a method; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端等候伺服器完成方法的處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> applied to an XML Web service method or XML Web service client can specify whether the XML Web service method is one way or not by setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> property of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>套用至 XML Web 服務方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端可以指定 XML Web 服務方法是否為其中一種方式，或不是藉由設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.OneWay%2A> property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.OneWay%2A>屬性可以在任何存取<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment is part of a SOAP extension that logs the SOAP messages sent and received by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼片段是記錄傳送和接收的 XML Web 服務 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This particular fragment outputs to that log file a phrase stating the XML Web service method is one-way, when the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.OneWay%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定片段輸出至該記錄檔片語，表示 XML Web service 方法單向的當<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.OneWay%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance of the class handling the method invocation on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理 Web 伺服器上方法引動過程的類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance of the class implementing the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 實作 XML Web Service 的類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Server%2A> property is an instance of the class implementing the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Server%2A>屬性是實作 XML Web 服務類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If a SOAP extension knew ahead of time the type of the class, it could cast <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Server%2A> to that type and access properties and methods of the class implementing the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 如果事先知道的 SOAP 擴充功能的類別類型，無法轉換<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Server%2A>該類型，並存取的屬性和實作 XML Web 服務之類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Server%2A> property can be accessed during <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Server%2A>屬性可以存取期間<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize>。

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment is part of a SOAP extension that logs the SOAP messages sent and received by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼片段是記錄傳送和接收的 XML Web 服務 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This particular fragment outputs to the log file the type of the XML Web service, if it is `MathSvc`.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定片段輸出至記錄檔類型的 XML Web 服務，如果它是`MathSvc`。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize" /> or <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.AfterDeserialize" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeSerialize" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來與 XML Web Service 通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A> property is guaranteed to be valid after the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeDeserialize> stage.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.SoapVersion%2A>屬性一定會有效之後<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeDeserialize>階段。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeDeserialize> stage the property is available, but the SOAP message has not been completely processed and SOAP extensions that may alter the contents of the SOAP message have not run.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage.BeforeDeserialize>階段屬性可供使用，但是 SOAP 訊息尚未完全處理而且尚未執行可能會改變內容的 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the base URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 取得 XML Web Service 的基礎 URL。

trans-unit.source: The base URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: XML Web Service 的基礎 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Url%2A> property can be accessed during any <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMessage.Url%2A>屬性可以在任何存取<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage>。

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment is part of a SOAP extension that logs the SOAP messages sent and received by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼片段是記錄傳送和接收的 XML Web 服務 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This particular fragment outputs to that log file the URL of the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定片段輸出至該記錄檔的 XML Web service URL。
